snippet: A pro-am bridge event at Bridge Haven in Hazelwood, Mo., raised almost $5,000 for BackStoppers, a nonprofit organization that gives money to the families of police officers, firefighters and emergency medical personnel who have been killed in the...
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at a pro-am bridge event at Bridge Haven in Hazelwood, Mo, to raise money for nonprofit group BackStoppers.
lead_paragraph: A pro-am bridge event at Bridge Haven in Hazelwood, Mo., raised almost $5,000 for BackStoppers, a nonprofit organization that gives money to the families of police officers, firefighters and emergency medical personnel who have been killed in the line of duty.

headline.seo: Bridge - Third Annual Charity Pro-Am for BackStoppers
headline.main: Third Annual Charity Pro-Am for BackStoppers
